titles.title: Secure Every Child Under the Right Equipment Standards Act of 2018
A bill to require the Secretary of Transportation to publish a notice of proposed rulemaking concerning seat belts on school buses, and for other purposes.
Secure Every Child Under the Right Equipment Standards Act of 2018
SECURES Act of 2018

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.

bill.summary:
Secure Every Child Under the Right Equipment Standards Act of 2018 or the SECURES Act of 2018
This bill directs the Department of Transportation to publish a notice of proposed rulemaking on new federal standards for school bus seat belt requirements on all school buses, regardless of gross vehicle weight rating.
